::Grounded::
Grounded stumbles out and hears Lambda and BH."I have dropped the 
shields, go, hurry."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Lambda::
>     "No.  It isn't you any more.  We need to fight sometimes.  To 
protect 
> those we love and care about."  She returns to robot mode.  "Now 
let's get 
> out there and save the day.  Then maybe we can find something fun 
to do."  
> She grins provocatively.
